content: dig for that second fpt repeat to end join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 4 repeat round 2 5 repeat round 3 continue in this manner until hat is desired length i made mine about 4 inches 10 cm then added a folded brim last round ch2 half_double_crochet in each stitch around join with a slip_stitch to 2nd chain of ch2 for folded brim continue working rounds of half_double_crochet same as the last round until brim is desired length i made mine 3 rounds about 1 inch 2 5 cm turn and continue working the same number of rounds of half_double_crochet you just did working in the opposite direction turn work only the one time 3 rounds for mine for a total brim length of 6 rounds about 1 5 inches 3 8cm unfolded this method insures that the part of the brim that is folded up shows the right side if you have any questions or comments please feel free to contact me at rustysarah@comcast net or send me a message on ravelry i am msbusyfingers copyright 2010 sarah margaret crittenden all rights reserved
